MCQ.description: Single Correct Answer: Choose one option from multiple choices (A, B, C, D). +3 for correct, -1 for wrong, 0 for unanswered

Multiple Correct.description: Multiple Correct: +4 if all correct options chosen; +3 if all 4 correct but only 3 chosen; +2 if 3+ correct but only 2 chosen (both correct); +1 if 2+ correct but only 1 chosen (correct); 0 if unanswered; -2 in all other cases

Numerical.description: Numerical Answer: +4 for correct answer, 0 for wrong/unanswered (no negative marking)

Pair Matching.description: Pair Matching: Match items from List-I (P, Q, R, S) with items from List-II (1, 2, 3, 4, 5). Answer format: P→X, Q→Y, R→Z, S→W where X,Y,Z,W are numbers from List-II. +4 if all pairs correctly matched, -1 for wrong, 0 for unanswered
